thread.title: U.S. tariffs dominate Argentina’s G20 summit

title: U.S. tariffs dominate Argentina’s G20 summit
text:
U.S. tariffs dominate Argentina’s G20 summit 1:27am IST - 01:21 
Tensions over planned U.S. tariffs were on full display as finance ministers and central bankers gathered in Buenos Aires, Argentina, for a G20 summit of developed nations. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
